contents:
因为中国封锁了twitter (如果点开那个state-affiliated media链接就能看到了)
https://help.twitter.com/en/rules-and-policies/state-affiliated-china
我来摘抄一下第一段
China blocks access to Twitter for regular users. We believe that people benefit from additional context when interacting with Chinese government and state-affiliated accounts.
(中国封锁了正常用户访问twitter, 我们相信用户会从标记和得知中国政府影响的账户中收益.)

再说了人家twitter是私营机构, 又不是un, 只要不违法乡镇对谁针对谁
